text: You should use a third party tool like google analytics through google tag manager and fire an event every time your form is submitted, this way you'll get to know the number of submissions.

Hi,

I am stuck with one problem regarding creating custom Object. When I try to create custom object with <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects#hs_cos_wrapper_widget_1587517435459|example schemas> it’s working fine. But when I try to use my schema, it’s not working…I got this error

```{
    "status": "error",
    "message": "Unexpected property type 'enumeration', expected one of: [string, object_coordinates, json]",
    "correlationId": "6053efc9-37b6-422d-8346-fd10a68aa335",
    "category": "VALIDATION_ERROR"
}```
I checked my schema and everything seems fine to me but somehow it’s not working….you can find schema I used in thread. can anyone help me with this ??
it should be fieldType not fieldtype
hi there. i have created a data capture form (3pages) in nextjs. can i host the next js code on HubSpot? and point a url to it??
